1.content:
You have been bullied your whole life, and there is literally no safe zone. your family teases you, your peers tease you, your teachers and principal tease you, and everyone who meets you teases you. You have had enough. One day, you feel something flowing through your body. Something...Cosmic. Something...powerful. Something...Life-changing.

Who will you get revenge on first?
Perhaps your mean sibling. Maybe the older sister who treats you like a baby, and parades you for her friends entrainment? Or the annoying younger brother, who laughs at you and refuses to except that your the older?
Could it be the popular kids who humiliated you at school?
Or perhaps the special teacher whose made it there life mission for every day of your life to be worst than the last?
Or could it be someone else all together? Some one you've always longed for revenge on? Someone who want to see suffer more than the others?
So many options, so many choices. Which to chose? They all deserve to be given a large slice of Karma.

The world will pay for making fun of you for being a...
1.title: the beginning

"ha ha ha. such a brave soul. rare in the bullied. but then, you are an exceptionally rare person. I will reveal myself, since you asked. go somewhere more private. I cannot make myself known in public." "can I have a name first?" "...you may call me Karm. Now, I will explain everything when we get some privacy." what do you do?

113111121.content: You tell "Karm" its okay to come out. a bright flash of light blinds you momentarily, then a perfect copy of you appears in front of you, except with a glowing line surrounding his outline, and his eyes keep changing color. when he speaks this time, it is in your voice, but with a strange deep echo. "Geo. You have been tormented by everyone, with no one to look to. your life is an eternal mocking, and all because you were born differently." "The story of my life. What does this have to do with you?" "Everything, Geo. I am the voice of Karma." "Karma? that thing I put on my ice cream?" "that's caramel. Karma is the force that punishes those who do wrong, and rewards those who do good. It also helps those who have suffered greatly, but have no power to change things. The last part is known to many as the 'fantasy effect.' Since you have suffered all your life, you are being granted power to last until you have evened the score and make it last. You just have to think of a person, and Karma will change them. The rules are, you can't undo or end life, (no unbirthings or age to death) and you cannot target yourself with these powers. You can change people's age (making them younger or older), change their continence (make them need diapers/pullups/toilet) or you can make people think they have changed in that way, without them actually change. and finally, you can change reality so that these changes will be normal to everyone other than you and the target. I bestow upon you the magical eye of Karma!" A bright light flashes, and you are momentarily blind in your left eye, then everything goes multicolor. " with this eye, you have the power I just explained to you. You can also call me at any time. Good luck, young one." With that, your doppelganger disappeared, and you decide to test out your new power. But where?

1131111212221.content:
You strut into Jake's room, feeling braver than you ever had before. Only when you close the door behind you does he take notice. He looks up at you, his thick, bullish face forming a smirk as you enter. He's clearly well built, as his musculature proves, and his walls are lined with posters depicting video game characters and scantily clad women. His hair is short and dark, a grimy brown, while his eyes are a cold, almost malicious grey.

"What do you want, Diaper Boy?" He asks, attempting to deepen his voice to sound older.

Smiling to yourself, your left eye begins to glimmer with a malefic light, and strange energy takes hold of your tyrant brother.

What will you do to him?
1131111212221.title: Choose Jake.

11311112122211.content: Jake's eyes widen as his muscles become loose and he drops the barbell he had been holding. Looking up at you angrily he attempts to stand, but is held down by the arcane forces acting upon his person, and as he attempts his defiance, his body begins to change...
11311112122211.title: Change his age.

choices: Turn his room into that of a baby.
113111121222111.content:
Defiance turns to fear in Jake's eyes as he feels an odd, warm feeling engulfing him. As you watch, a smile forming on your face, he begins to shrink, slowly at first, then faster. His muscles, carefully honed over these recent months rapidly leave him, and his bulky face loses its bullish shape. He speaks, anger in his voice, poisoned by a tinge of fear.
"Stop this, stop it now!"
With his final word, his adam's apple receded back into his throat, as every vestige of puberty left him. His once muscled chest was left hairless, and the fear on his face became more tangible, as realisation gripped him. By this point, his height began to jerk down spasmodically, his massive growth spurts fading away, leaving him as a boy but a few inches taller than yourself. His track bottoms, which had as yet been unaffected by the transformation, barring their decrease in size, finally began to change, crawling up his legs in a most unnatural manner and growing thinner, eventually forming a pair of white briefs around him. At this point tears began filling his eyes as he finally became younger than you,
"Please, Geo, stop, I promise I won't insult you ever again!"
You could only smirk as he fell further in years, reaching toddlerhood, his briefs thickened, and colourful patterns covered them, until finally they became a thick pull-up. Your smile widens as his face rounds out with baby fat, and his body becomes even smaller, his feet having long since left the carpeted floor.
"Pwease, me no wanna be bab- Agh.. Wah!"
His cries for mercy devolved into a pathetic cry as his transformation was finally completed, his pull-up thickening into a pampers diaper, he grew silent, looking at his once muscled, now chubby arms, prior to looking down. Suddenly, his diaper began to thicken and turn yellow, filling up with urine, as the last energy drinks of his now lost teenhood filled his diaper to capacity. Still he did not cry, for suddenly he looked up at you, his eyes filled with tears as a great fart sounded its horn through the room, and he filled his large diaper with an amount of poo that a 13 year old would expel. He is held aloft slightly, his full diaper squishing and forming a seat beneath him.

It was then, all of his pride, dignity, and strength gone, that he fully gave in to his infantile urges, his intelligent mind trapped within an infant's body.

You looked at him, and relished the moment, saying but one thing.

"Who's the diaper boy now?"

1553.title: other ages and ways you are padded

15531.content:
Well, your life has never been easy. Due a birth defect you always had and always will have a weak bladder. But is this a reason the world is treating so bad? Not really! You accept and understand that you have to wear pullups at daytime and diapers to bed, but since you are of above normal intelligence, you can't understand why everyone is treating and telling you are a little boy - you are 15 for gods sake!

There is your mom: She loves you..but why cant she see that you are almost completely grown up?
It already started when you came to that age to begin with school.
When you were six, she didn't think you were ready for first grade -even though you were two grades ahead of the rest of your class. So she made a appointment at the local school board to tell them you need more time before grade school classes.
So you came to first grade when you were already 9 years old, which made you always the oldest one with now 15 years you are just a 6th grader, yet you are smaller than the majority of them! She never was discreet with your condition: she checked on you in public or even in front of classmates, which made it nearly, if not completely impossible for you to make friends, she hires babysitters, orders a 6:30 bedtime for you, etc...

Then there is your little healthy brother Jim, he is 10 years old. He often tease you and often brags with his potty training and is also making fun of you in front of his friends and many more, and sometimes uses your pullup as a toilet when no one else is looking.

School is even more worse for you, especially since you came to middle school.
There you have 3 major enemies.
Chelsea, a 13 year old popular girl who always picks on weaker students like you.

Mrs Miller, your teacher for math, science and homeroom, who barely left out a opportunity to remind the class what dumb little girl you are and that you are a shame for the whole school, and she even added a new unit: regression, just to have you for the perfect volunteer.

Mrs Moore the school nurse. When you had to go to her to get a new pullup and sometimes fresh pants after your pullups had leaked she always said that if she would be keen about helping kids with accidents she had applied at a primary school or daycare.


There are a lot more people who picked on you..but with your new powers you finally can get your revenge!
But where do you want to start?
15531.title: 15 year old boy in pullups

15532.content:
Well, your life has never been easy.

But is this a reason the world is treating so bad? You think: No!
You accept and understand that you have to wear pullups at daytime and diapers to bed, but since you are normal intelligent you cant understand why everyone is treating and telling you are a little girl - you are 15 for gods sake!

There is your mom: She loves you..but why cant she see that you are a allmost grown up?
It allready started when you came to that age to begin with school.
When you was six, she didnt thought you were ready for first grade -even you already could count, read and write a bit. So she made a appointment at the local school board to tell them you need more time before grade school classes.
So you came to first grade when you were already 8 years old which made you always the oldest one..with now 15 years you are just a 7th grader.
She never was discreet with your bladder conditions: she checked on you in puplic or even in front of classmates and peer group which made it hard for you to make friends, she hires babysitters, orders a early bedtime for you, etc, etc...

Then there is your little healthy brother Jim, he is 10 years old. He often tease you and often brags with his potty training and is also making fun of you in front of his friends and many more.

School is even more worse for you, especialy since you came to middle school.
There you have 3 major enemies.
Chelsea a 13 year old popular girl who always picks on weaker students like you.

Mrs Miller your teacher for math and science who barely left out a opportunity to remind the class what dumb little girl you are and that you are a shame for the whole shool.

Mrs Moore the school nurse. When you had to go to her to get a new pullup and sometimes fresh pants after your pullups had leaked she allways said that if she would be keen about helping kids with accidents she had applied at a primary school or daycare.


There are a lot more people who picked on you..but with your new powers you finaly can get your revenge!
But where do you want to start?

155321.content:
It started on a normal Thursday afternoon at home. At least everone else would think it was a normal day, but you, with your new powers knew it would became a very interesting day.
You are sitting in your room, thinking about how to use your powers.
Of course you are wearing your pullups under your casual clothes but your happy they are still dry.

Susan, your mom is probably in the living room watching some stupid tv shows and might think that you are playing with dolls or doing other childish things.
Soon, you are sure, she will came to you and check if you are dry and to remind you to go potty -thats her usual routine she did arround any full hour.

Jim is in his room with two friends, Carl and Michael. You can here them loudly how they are playing. From the noises they make you assume that they are playing out Star Wars with simulated light saber sounds.

Now you finaly have an idea how to use your powers for the first time!

1553212.title: Let your mom stop treating you like a little kid

155322.content: you are Alexa, and you are in math, in your "new seat." you asked for one away from the rest of the class, and when you walk in, you see that the "new seat" was a highchair. you are trying to listen to Mrs Miller talk about quadratic equations, you can't afford to fail a class again, entering as late as you did. you hear a strange deep voice in your head. "Alexa...I am the Voice of Karma...You have suffered great torment from your family...from your peers...from your teachers...and from your doctors who diagnosed you...I am here to make things right...Since you have suffered 15 years of torment......I will give you 45 years of Power. All you have to do is think about either regressing or progressing someone else's age as long as you don't kill or reverse their lives...think about changing someone else's continence...or think about changing the public's perception of someone else's age or continence...The power will not work on you, as one selfish move with Karma is enough to kill you...So be careful..." And with that, the voice vanished. Who is the first target?
155322.title: At school

info.brief_description: Everyone always bullied you for wearing Diapers, now its there turn.
info.description:
(This story is solely the idea of the user MANatee, who asked me to create it for them as they were unable. All credit goes to them.)

Up to now your life hasn't been easy. Due to a condition you still have accidents, as such you've been forced to spend your life in either Diapers or Pull ups (which one is up to you). And believe me, no ones made it easy for you, not your peers, not your family, no one. Everyone's bullied you, teased you, laughed at you, humiliated and embarrassed you, time and time again, without a single break.

But perhaps there is some justice in this universe. Perhaps someone has been watching your plight and wants to help. For now you have the power to get the justice you deserve. Where it came from? You have idea. How it works? You don't know. But regardless you now have it. What are these great powers you know possess? Well:

You can control others Age's, able to make them either older or younger at will.
You can control there level Continence ranging from absolute, to the occasional accident, to completely incontinent and anything in between.
You can also control people's Perception's of others and yourself. You can for example make an adult appear a tiny baby. And once you've altered this perception, reality will alter around them, to make it seem this new perception is real. For instance if you made a son appear to be a baby his mother, then his mother would be able to carry him as if he was a baby and easily force him into things that only a baby could fit into.
You can also make any of your changes reality, so it seems its always been that way, with only yourself and anyone you chose, remembering the truth.
You can also undo any changes you make, nothing you can do is irreversible.

They all thought it was funny to humiliate you, now lets see how funny they think it is when the roles are swapped.

Here are the rules:
no swearing.
no killing off the characters.
characters have sex (does not extend to minors), but not to extremes.
keep the language PG13.
spell out everything (no saying "u" instead of "you").
no one-choice only chapters.
no unbirthing or ageing people to dust, no using age modifications to make them die, whether it be directly or indirectly.
no sudden plot changing (if you must change the plot, then change it over a minimum of 10 chapters, none of which can be 'option' chapters).
the only short chapters (3 or less sentences) I will allow are 'option' Chapters.
only the transformations described in the introduction (Age Regression, Age progression, Continence Change, and Perception) are allowed, all others aren't.
no 'reader's choice' chapters.
Please rate and review
And have fun!
info.pretty_title: Revenge is a Dish Best Served Padded
